text: @canenvironment oh jeez... I was just having some fun. Sorry I made you go through that..😑

@kemper_temper A directive banning pets in the workplace was established in 2011 to ensure that all Environment and Climate Change Canada employees have a safe, non-threatening, and healthy working environment. This photo was taken in a non-government vehicle while Paul and his wife (Erica) were volunteering for the #ChristmasBirdCount and they decided to take Bailey along for company.☺️
Sad that in the prairie region dogs are banned from all EC buildings and vehicles. #wankerbureaucrats 🙄🤔
